passwordNotNullOrEmpty: Password must not be null or empty
userCategoryNotFound: User category with this name not found
userNotFound: User with this id not found
userCategoryOrUserNotFound: User category with this name or user with this id not found

userCategoryNotDeleteBecauseUser: User category cannot be deleted because a User has this category
